00038 class BDDRecord extends AbstractClass implements Iterator
00039 {
00040 //----------------------------------------------------------------- PUBLIC
00041 
00042 //--------------------------------------------------------- public methods
00043 
00044     public function IsValid (  )
00053         {
00054                 return true;
00055         } //----- End of IsValid
00056         
00057     public function Validate (  )
00065     {
00066                 $this->isValid = true;
00067         
00068                 return NULL;
00069         } //----- End of Validate
00070         
00071     public function PropertyExists( $propertyName )
00081     {
00082                 return ( isset ( $this->row[ $propertyName ] ) );
00083     } //----- End of PropertyExists
00084         
00085     public function GetProperty( $propertyName )
00096     {
00097                 if ( $this->PropertyExists( $propertyName ) )
00098                 {
00099                         return $this->row [ $propertyName ];
00100                 }
00101                 else
00102                 {
00103                         $errs = new Errors ( );
00104                         
00105                         $errs->Add ( new BDDError ( BDDError::CONNECTION_COLUMN_INEXISTANT , 'Property '.$propertyName.' does not exist.' ) );
00106                         
00107                         return $errs;
00108                 }
00109     } //----- End of GetProperty
00110         
00111     public function SetProperty( $propertyName , $propertyValue )
00120     {
00121                 $this->row [ $propertyName ] = $propertyValue;
00122                 
00123                 $this->isValid = false;
00124     } //----- End of SetProperty
00125         
00126         public function GetPropertyCount ( )
00133         {
00134                         return count ( $this->row );
00135         } //----- End of GetPropertyCount
00136         
00137 //------------------------------------------- Implementation's of Iterator
00138     public function Rewind( )
00143     {
00144         reset( $this->row );
00145     } //--- End of Rewind
00146 
00147     public function Current( )
00154     {
00155         return current( $this->row );
00156     } //---- End of Current
00157     
00158     public function Key( )
00165     {
00166         return key( $this->row );
00167     } //---- End of Key
00168     
00169     public function Next( )
00176     {
00177         return next( $this->row );
00178     } //---- End of Next
00179     
00180     public function Valid( )
00188     {
00189         return $this->current( ) !== false;
00190     } //---- End of Valid
00191 //--------------------------------------- End of Iterator's implementation
00192 
00193 //---------------------------------------------- Constructors - destructor
00194     function __construct( $row = NULL )
00202     {
00203                 parent::__construct();
00204                 
00205                 if ( is_array( $row ) )
00206                 {
00207                         $this->row = $row;
00208                 }
00209                 else
00210                 {
00211                         $this->row = array();
00212                 }
00213                 
00214                 $this->isValid = false;
00215     } //---- End of constructor
00216         
00217     function __destruct( )
00221         {
00222                 parent::__destruct();
00223         } //----- End of Destructor
00224

00226     function __ToString ( )
00233     {
00234         return (String)var_export( $this->row );
00235     } // End of __ToString
